name: ScaleBuying
description: Allow buying of tokens in batches of increasing price.

eventDecorators.name: Bought
eventDecorators.description: The event emitted when tokens are bought.

parameterDecorators.name: buyer
parameterDecorators.description: The address that may claim the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: pricePerToken
parameterDecorators.description: The price per token that the tokens were bought for.

eventDecorators.name: Claimed
eventDecorators.description: The event emitted when a claim is executed.

parameterDecorators.name: claimer
parameterDecorators.description: The address the claim has been processed for.

functionDecorators.name: amountAwarded
functionDecorators.description: The amount that has been awarded so far.

functionDecorators.name: amountsClaimable
functionDecorators.description: The amounts of tokens claimable by an address.

functionDecorators.name: boughtAsset
functionDecorators.description: The token that is being bought.

functionDecorators.name: buy
functionDecorators.description: Buy tokens in the current block.

parameterDecorators.name: _paymentAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to spend. This will be transfered from msg.sender who should approved this amount first.

parameterDecorators.name: _target
parameterDecorators.description: The address that the amounts would be bought for. Tokens are distributed after calling the claim method.

functionDecorators.name: claim
functionDecorators.description: Claim ABQ bought for the given address. Claims can only be processed after liquidity has been established.

parameterDecorators.name: _target
parameterDecorators.description: The address to process claims for.

functionDecorators.name: closingDate
functionDecorators.description: The date in unix timestamp (seconds) when the sale closes.

functionDecorators.name: currentBlock
functionDecorators.description: Get the current block number, starting at 0.

functionDecorators.name: currentPrice
functionDecorators.description: Get the current price per token.

functionDecorators.name: initialPrice
functionDecorators.description: The initial price for the sale.

functionDecorators.name: liquidityEstablisher
functionDecorators.description: The location of the ILO, used to know when tokens can be claimed.

functionDecorators.name: maxBlocks
functionDecorators.description: The number of blocks up for sale.

functionDecorators.name: minter
functionDecorators.description: The minter for the token being bought.

functionDecorators.name: paymentAsset
functionDecorators.description: The token to use for purchasing.

functionDecorators.name: priceIncrease
functionDecorators.description: The price increase for each token block.

functionDecorators.name: setLiquidityEstablisher
functionDecorators.description: Set the ILO to use to track if liquidity has been astablished and thus claims can be allowed.

functionDecorators.name: tokensLeftInBlock
functionDecorators.description: Get the amount of tokens left in a given block.

parameterDecorators.name: _block
parameterDecorators.description: The block to get the number of tokens left for.

returnDecorators.name: _tokensLeft
returnDecorators.description: The number of tokens left in the given _block.

functionDecorators.name: tokensPerPriceBlock
functionDecorators.description: The amount of tokens per block.

functionDecorators.name: treasury
functionDecorators.description: The address to which the funds should be sent to.
